snippet.title: HL2 Arctic Adventure: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Open your eyes Mr Freeman, you are waiting for a new adventure.

Spin off modification which starts after events of episode 2.
In this mod you will ride through the Arctic landscapes, discover Aperture Science secrets and try new weapons.

Steam release:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/628410/Arctic_Adventure_Episodes

Moddb release: (Install in sourcemods as usual) (OUTDATED)
https://www.moddb.com/mods/arctic-adventure/downloads/arctic-adventure-release-103
